src:
'Housefull 4' is racing against 'Golmaal Again' to become highest-grossing comedy film!
04 Nov 2019, 15:36 by TIMESOFINDIA.COM
'Housefull 4' has been scoring huge at the box office since the release of the film. The multi-starrer has hit the screens on the festive occasion of Diwali and registered a strong second weekend!
The film has collected a whopping amount of Rs 168 crore net at the ticket window. The film is racing against 'Golmaal Again' to become the highest-grossing comedy film in terms of nett collections.
According to BoxOfficeIndia.com reports, in terms of gross collections, it is a tougher task and the 'Housefull 4' will have to hold phenomenally well from here on. Akshay's film was released before Diwali while Ajay Devgn's film was released post-Diwali.
The all India first week comparison for the Diwali holiday between Golmaal Again and Housefull 4 is as follows:

Mumbai:

Golmaal Again - 59,53,00,000
Housefull 4 - 51,64,00,000

Delhi / UP:

Golmaal Again - 24,38,00,000
Housefull 4 - 25,19,00,000
East Punjab:Golmaal Again - 9,56,00,000
Housefull 4 - 9,87,00,000

Rajasthan:

Golmaal Again - 8,11,00,000
Housefull 4 - 8,95,00,000

CP Berar:

Golmaal Again - 8,29,00,000
Housefull 4 - 8,51,00,000

CI:

Golmaal Again - 5,44,00,000
Housefull 4 - 5,50,00,000

Nizam / Andhra:

Golmaal Again - 5,28,00,000
Housefull 4 - 6,83,00,000

Mysore:

Golmaal Again - 4,37,00,000
Housefull 4 - 4,92,00,000

Tamil Nadu / Kerala:

Golmaal Again - 85,00,000
Housefull 4 - 1,00,00,000

West Bengal:

Golmaal Again - 4,29,00,000
Housefull 4 - 5,28,00,000

Bihar:

Golmaal Again - 3,51,00,000
Housefull 4 - 4,46,00,000

Assam:

Golmaal Again - 1,08,00,000
Housefull 4 - 1,81,00,000

Odisha:

Golmaal Again - 1,32,00,000
Housefull 4 - 1,90,00,000

TOTAL:

Golmaal Again- 1,36,01,00,000
Housefull 4 - 1,35,86,00,000
Helmed by Farhad Samji, 'Housefull 4' features an ensemble cast of Akshay Kumar, Kriti Sanon, Riteish Deshmukh, Kriti Kharbanda, Bobby Deol and Pooja Hegde. The film clashed at the box office with Rajkummar Rao's 'Made in China' and Taapsee Pannu-Bhumi Pednekar's 'Saand Ki Aankh'.
